backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with data models for members, profiles, transactions, withdrawals, products, purchases, and network structures, and initializes storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing domain-removal changes, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summary descriptions of various frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Empty documentation file intended for custom-domain instructions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file setting canonical and Open Graph URLs to the default Caffeine domain and loading the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Empty custom-domain allowlist file for IC domain configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling identity initialization, routing, role checks, and profile-completion modal behavior.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with role‑based admin tab, icon buttons, and page navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a stylized footer with branding, contact info, and social media links using decorative gradients and icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, authentication handling, and responsive mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/components/KomisiCalculator: Implements an incentive calculator that computes commissions based on selected MyRepublic packages or custom pricing.
frontend/src/components/MemberDetailModa: Displays a modal showing detailed member info, transactions, commissions, and a network tree view.
frontend/src/components/NetworkTreeVisua: Draws a hierarchical family tree on a canvas, visualizing downline network levels.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingSteppe: Shows a multi-step onboarding guide indicating user progress with dynamic status and navigation.
frontend/src/components/PreWhatsAppConta: Handles a modal form for submitting customer contact details and geolocation before opening WhatsApp, including product fetching and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailMod: Displays detailed product information in a styled modal, including price, features, and commission calculation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a multi-field profile setup form with dynamic address handling and role-specific behavior for saving user profiles.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseModal.ts: Empty placeholder component file for a purchase modal.
frontend/src/components/RouteGuard.tsx: Guards routes based on authentication and user role, showing loading and error states when access is restricted.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawalReques: Handles withdrawal requests, triggers WhatsApp messaging with request details, and displays success or error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingSteps.ts: Computes a user's onboarding steps based on authentication, registration, profile completion, and verification status, with optional navigation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with the backend actor, including profile, role, admin checks, registration, and profile updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including a neon color palette and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/addressData.ts: Contains static Indonesian address data including countries, provinces, city mappings, and postal code types.
frontend/src/lib/productCatalog.ts: Maps product names to UI metadata like icons and gradient colors, with a helper to retrieve metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Landing page with animated hero section and call-to-action that handles login and navigation based on authentication and profile status.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for managing leaderboard data, products, members, and withdrawals with CRUD actions and modal controls.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: Simple page that displays a commission calculator component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Member dashboard showing profile, transactions, network data, withdrawals, and verification status with login handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with onboarding, product listing, auto-bootstrap logic, and navigation based on authentication and user profile.
frontend/src/pages/JoinPage.tsx: Registration page that manages member signup with login prompts, validation, and post-registration navigation.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkPage.tsx: Renders the network tree page, handling authentication, loading states, and displaying downline stats with a visualization component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and container settings with custom neon-themed design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, business rules, and known issues for the MyRepublic Network Hub dApp.
